intervention_catalogue.name: FIRS4Women
intervention_catalogue.long_description: A programme to help people build themselves up to have a stronger sense of who they are, what they are capable of and what skills they have to be able to deal with life’s curveballs
intervention_catalogue.session_detail:
2 x One-to-one session;
 6 x group sessions

risk_consideration.cn_score_guide:
Need is evidenced by at least one
of the following OASys criteria
being satisfied:
- 11.3 = 2
- Thinking & behaviour related
RoSH
- Attitudes related RoSH
risk_consideration.ogrs_score_guide:
If OVP is not available, OGRS3 (over 2 years):
score of 25+

special_educational_needs.exclusion_literacy_level_guide: Participants should be sufficiently literate (able to read and understand simple sentences

exclusion.remaining_license_community_order_guide: Check with Treatment Manager if less than 9 months
exclusion.alcohol_drug_problem_guide: Alcohol / drug problems need to be stable before attendance.
exclusion.mental_health_problem_guide: Those with mental health problems should only be excluded from the programme if the issues are acute and damage the individual’s ability to relate to others or concentrate
exclusion.other_preferred_method_guide: Must not be suitable for or not able to access an Accredited Programme
